instruction: Describe a painting techniques used by Pablo Picasso.
output: Pablo Picasso was famous for his use of collage, cubism, and his trademark style of distortion. He often painted in layers, often describing his technique as "stacking" different elements of a painting on top of each other. He was also well known for his experimentation with color and texture, often using thick brush strokes and blending colors together to achieve a certain effect.
